org.jcvi.jillion.internal.core.io

Class OpenAwareInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • org.jcvi.jillion.internal.core.io.OpenAwareInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class OpenAwareInputStream
extends InputStream
    OpenAwareInputStream is an InputStream that has an extra method isOpen(). Marking is not supported.
    Author:
    dkatzel

      • isOpen

        public boolean isOpen()
        Is the inputStream still open (not closed). Performing this check will not advance the byte stream so future read calls will not miss any bytes. An open inputstream may still return a -1 when InputStream.read() is called if the stream has reached the end of the file, but has not yet be closed via InputStream.close().
        Returns:
        true if reading additional bytes from the inputstream will not throw an IOException; false otherwise.
